DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine maximum tolerate dose paclitaxel combine cisplatin irinotecan patient locally advance metastatic solid tumor . II . Determine dose limit toxicity paclitaxel combine cisplatin irinotecan patient population . III . Establish recommend phase II dose regimen patient population . IV . Assess antitumor activity regimen select solid tumor malignancy . OUTLINE : This dose escalation study paclitaxel . All patient receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour , cisplatin IV 30 minute , follow irinotecan IV 30 minute weekly 4 week day 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 . Treatment repeat every six week least 3 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Cohorts 3-6 patient receive escalate dos paclitaxel . If 2 patient experience dose limit toxicity ( DLT ) particular dose level , escalation cease maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) define previous dose level . Patients follow death . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 12-27 patient accrue study within 6-9 month .
